Mark Foy

The birth of 18ft Skiff Racing as we know it today occurred on Sydney Harbour on 26 January 1892. The father was Mark Foy.

Read More

JJ Giltinan

James Joseph Giltinan, another entrepeneurial Sydney businessman, created a new 18ft skiff club following the banning Aberdare.

Read More

Major events that take place in the southern and northern hemispheres.

Results of Euro GP Campione 2018

18 Jun, 2018 Friedrich Renner 116

 

Skiff Race Tegernsee june 9-10

8 May, 2018 Friedrich Renner 5970

Registration is open for the "Tegernseer Skiffregatta".

Nice Skiff Meeting with 29er, 49er, 14 Footer and 18´s  in Rottach Egern on lake Tegernsee

- a picturesque small lake in the alps in South Germany with thermal wind systems.

R/V or tent on the beach is possible, breakfast and dinner is inclusive / provided by the club.

For the following race in Campione the trailers may be stored there.

http://www.raceoffice.org/viewer.php?eid=21108891325adca15112fbf&file=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.raceoffice.org%2Fdata%2F5982264294.pdf%3Fchanged%3D2018-04-26+23%3A24%3A32&mode=

http.title: SEO Speaker : Dixon Jones
http.html:
• Dixon Jones
  • His Work
  • His Passions
  • His Words (blog)
  • Contact & Connect

Dixon Jones

Speaking of Internet Marketing…

Dixon Jones works with you to take your idea from the bedroom to the boardroom. If you are the kind of person that wants to stay out of the limelight and change the world, you’ll need a partner willing to help you get to market without taking so much of your business that you feel you’ve lost control.

Dixon has been at the start of several successful start-ups, from Murder Mystery games to a world leading search engine specializing in web cartography and backlink analysis.

Dixon has talked about Internet Marketing (and Majestic) all over the world. Apart from the amazing technology, his approach to innovation in enterprise keeps getting him invited onto the podium to be a speaker at Internet Marketing conferences. If you would like him to speak, he is open to offers.

Here are three selected talks.

Tedx Talk on Dreaming Big

How Trusted is Your Website?

Creating a Workflow for Link Building
